def debug_logging_test():
    import logging
    logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    
    # Test all log levels to verify DEBUG is shown
    logger.debug("DEBUG: This should be visible when LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG")
    logger.info("INFO: This should always be visible")
    logger.warning("WARNING: This should always be visible")
    logger.error("ERROR: This should always be visible")
    
    print("Standard output from function execution")
    
    return {
        "message": "Debug logging test completed",
        "current_log_level": logging.getLogger().level,
        "level_name": logging.getLevelName(logging.getLogger().level)
    }
